Description:
Google to Entra Identity Sync service is a cloud-2-cloud user Identity onboarding and one way synchronization tool from Google workspace to Entra ID. This will be available as part of the M365 Admin center for Google compete customers moving into M365 to create the identities in M365 farm and move Drive and Mail content into Onedrive and Exchange online
GA date: January CY2025
Preview date: December CY2024
Title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Google to Entra Identity Sync service
